hero.title: Access & Use {website.name}
hero.subtitle: Learn how to join and make the most of {website.name} to create and share your games

sections.title: Account Creation
sections.description: Sign up for a free {website.name} account to start creating games. Provide a valid email and set up a secure password. Your account gives you access to all tools and features.

sections.title: Platform Compatibility
sections.description: {website.name} is accessible via web browsers on desktop and mobile devices. No installation requiredâ€”just log in and start creating from anywhere.

sections.title: Free and Premium Plans
sections.description: Start with our free plan to access core features, or upgrade to a premium plan for advanced tools and higher usage limits. Check {website.name} for plan details.

sections.title: Community Access
sections.description: Join our community forums to collaborate, share projects, and get feedback. Connect with other creators to enhance your game development journey.

usage.title: Using {website.name}
usage.description: Once signed up, explore {website.name}'s visual scripting, 3D engine, and asset library to build games. Export to multiple platforms with ease and collaborate in real-time with your team. Follow our guidelines for a safe and creative experience.

cta.title: Ready to Create?
cta.subtitle: Join {website.name} today and start building your games with our powerful, user-friendly tools.
